ED_Title: Commemorative meeting of the General Assembly on the occasion of the International Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery  and the Transatlantic Slave Trade
ED_DecisionText: At its 63rd plenary meeting, on 29 March 2022, the General Assembly decided, without setting a precedent, to invite Nikole Hannah-Jones of the New York Times Magazine and creator of the “1619 Project” to make a keynote statement at the commemorative meeting on the occasion of the International Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Slavery and the Transatlantic Slave Trade.
